property.name: executionMode
property.description: Sets the working mode for datatype1 or datatype2 Full Load. Possible values: datatype1/datatype2

property.name: partitions
property.description: Number of RDD partitions, created by Spark Scala code. Higher number of partition means faster processing time and more compaction in HBase.

property.name: numberOfBucketsToProcessInOneIteration
property.description: number of buckets to process in one iteration (one full loading)

property.name: resolveLocation
property.description: Sets whether the cell location should be resolved. Possible values: true/false

property.name: locDataUpdateFreq
property.description: Defines the update frequency of cell location data in hours. If resolveLocation set to false, this parameter is not used.

property.name: outputTable
property.description: Name of HBase table for main data.

property.name: hbaseNumberOfRegions
property.description: Number of regions to create table with. Usable with keys with numeric prefix only.

property.name: hbaseTableCompression
property.description: Compression algorithm for HBase table.

property.name: cfTTL
property.description: TTL value for HBase tables is sec.

property.name: phoenixJDBCConnString
property.description: jdbc connection string for apache phoenix

property.name: hdfsTempFolder
property.description: Hdfs folder for temporary HFiles created by Spark code. Important: The directory has to be on the HDFS volume, which is used by Hbase; and the subdirectory name under Hbase root has to start with '.'.

property.name: zkHost
property.description: Zookeeper Host IP

property.name: zkPort
property.description: Zookeeper port

property.name: zkReadyFolder
property.description: Zookeeper path of znodes for data bulks created by InputAdapter.

property.name: zkProcessedFolder
property.description: Zookeeper path of znodes for data BulkLoaded into HBase.

property.name: zkMonitoringFolder
property.description: Zookeeper path of znodes for data BulkLoaded into HBase.

property.name: pgConnString
property.description: Connection string for database server of cell location.

property.name: dbUser
property.description: User for reaching cell location table.

property.name: dbPass
property.description: Password for reaching cell location table.

property.name: dbLocationTable
property.description: Name of table for resolving cell location.

property.name: dbType
property.description: Database type

property.name: oracleConnString
property.description: Connection string for database server of test location.
